creator: Party Drinks Limited
descriptionHtml: Drinks.ng is the largest online distributor of beer, spirit, and wine in Nigeria. Buying drinks from our liquor store is the safest and easiest way to shop for your drinks in Lagos, Ibadan, Abuja and other states. We save you time, and help you avoid long queues and crowded stores. Choose from a wide variety of cognac, champagne, spirits, whisky, mixers, wines and beer from top brands like Hennessy, Remy Martins, Martell and much more at the best prices.

title: DrinksNG - Buy Drinks Online

creator: Party Drinks Limited
descriptionHtml:
Drinks.ng is your number one mobile liquor-store that embodies the user experience of a physical store with the affordability of a wholesale market and the convenience of a mobile application.

As the largest online distribution of beer, wines and spirits in Nigeria, its reputation speaks for itself. Drinks.ng is directly affiliated with all the brands it carries, therefore there is a 100% guarantee on authenticity and best pricing.

Are you having a wedding, party or you just need to get drinks in single bottles or cases?
Drinks.ng app allows you order drinks from a single bottle to as many as 50 cases or more and have them delivered to any location of your choice nationwide.

Let’s assume you are having a house party and you need to restock on drinks, the app helps you do just that in few simples steps:

HOW THE APP WORKS IN FEW STEPS
1) Download the drinks.ng app from the App Store or Play-store.
2) Create an account using your email or phone number and unique password.
3) Select the drink category you want to shop from (Wines, Champagne, Cognac, Whiskey, Spirits Beers & Ciders).
4) Shop for your favorite brands and products from our exhaustive list.
5) Add to cart and initiate checkout.

If you require further assistance in completing your transaction, click help or click the call icon on the bottom right of the homepage or the top of the menu page.

To use the Drinks.ng app you must be 18 years and above.
The app is available to users in Lagos, Ibadan, Abuja, Port Harcourt and other states in Nigeria.

To get in touch with us:
- Website: www.drinks.ng
- Email: info@drinks.ng
- Customer Support Hotline: 0700-882-9996
- Instagram: @drinks.ng
- TikTok: @drinksng
- Twitter: @drinksng
- Facebook: @drinks.ng
- Snapchat: @drinksng1

DOWNLOAD NOW - All your drinks in one place.

title: Drinks.ng - Buy Drinks Online

creator: Party Drinks Limited
descriptionHtml:
Drinks.ng is your number one mobile liquor-store that embodies the user experience of a physical store with the affordability of a wholesale market and the convenience of a mobile application.

As the largest online distribution of beer, wines and spirits in Nigeria, its reputation speaks for itself. Drinks.ng is directly affiliated with all the brands it carries, therefore there is a 100% guarantee on authenticity and best pricing.

Are you having a wedding, party or you just need to get drinks in single bottles or cases?
Drinks.ng app allows you order drinks from a single bottle to as many as 50 cases or more and have them delivered to any location of your choice nationwide.

Let’s assume you are having a house party and you need to restock on drinks, the app helps you do just that in few simples steps:

HOW THE APP WORKS IN FEW STEPS
1) Download the drinks.ng app from the App Store or Play-store.
2) Create an account using your email or phone number and unique password.
3) Select the drink category you want to shop from (Wines, Champagne, Cognac, Whiskey, Spirits Beers & Ciders).
4) Shop for your favorite brands and products from our exhaustive list.
5) Add to cart and initiate checkout.

If you require further assistance in completing your transaction, click help or click the call icon on the bottom right of the homepage or the top of the menu page.

To use the Drinks.ng app you must be 18 years and above.
The app is available to users in Lagos, Ibadan, Abuja, Port Harcourt and other states in Nigeria.

To get in touch with us:
- Website: www.drinks.ng
- Email: info@drinks.ng
- Customer Support Hotline: 0700-882-9996
- Instagram: @drinks.ng
- TikTok: @drinksng
- Twitter: @drinksng
- Facebook: @drinks.ng
- Snapchat: @drinksng1

DOWNLOAD NOW - All your drinks in one place.
descriptionShort: Drinks.ng is the official app for Drinks in Nigeria

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• You can now opt to receive an email notification when a product is restocked.
• Notifications on order status changes.
• Chat support.
• Join the party and stand a chance to win amazing benefits when you buy specific products in specified quantities.
• We value your feedback! Review the retailers you buy from.
Bug fixes:
• You can now change the delivery address on the Order Summary screen smoothly.
• Search delivery location.
• With each update, we enhance your shopping experience!
